TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 指定要進行 WMI 連接所需的所有設定。

span.span: Specifies all settings required to make a WMI connection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連線到遠端電腦使用預設連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with default connection options. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/cs/ConnectionOptions-9.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/vb/ConnectionOptions-9.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::AuthenticationLevel Authentication { System::Management::AuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::AuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 COM 驗證等級，以使用於這個連接中的作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 傳回 列舉值，表示連接到本機或遠端電腦所使用的 COM 驗證等級。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the COM authentication level used for a connection to the local or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 2000 及以下的 WMI 服務會要求連接層級驗證，在 Windows XP 上的和更高版本，它會要求封包層級驗證。On Windows 2000 and below, the WMI service will request Connect level authentication, while on Windows XP and higher it will request Packet level authentication. 如果用戶端需要特定的驗證設定，這個屬性可用來控制這個特定的連接上的驗證層級。If the client requires a specific authentication setting, this property can be used to control the authentication level on this particular connection. 例如，屬性可以設如果用戶端需要的所有通訊進行加密。For example, the property can be set to if the client requires all communication to be encrypted. ## 屬性值Property Value 要用於這個連接作業中 COM 驗證層級。The COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection. 預設值是，表示用戶端會使用伺服器要求的驗證層級根據標準的 DCOM 交涉程序。The default value is , which indicates that the client will use the authentication level requested by the server, according to the standard DCOM negotiation process. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要用來驗證指定使用者的授權。

span.span: Gets or sets the authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 ，這個字串會定義用於驗證指定使用者的授權。

span.span: Returns a that defines the authority used to authenticate the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須傳遞的屬性，如下所示： 如果它是以字串的開頭"Kerberos:"將會使用 Kerberos 驗證，這個屬性應該包含 Kerberos 主體名稱。The property must be passed as follows: If it begins with the string "Kerberos:", Kerberos authentication will be used and this property should contain a Kerberos principal name. 例如，套用至物件的For example, ``` Kerberos: ``` 如果屬性值開頭為字串"NTLMDOMAIN:"，則會使用 NTLM 驗證和屬性應該包含 NTLM 網域名稱。If the property value begins with the string "NTLMDOMAIN:", NTLM authentication will be used and the property should contain a NTLM domain name. 例如，套用至物件的For example, ``` NTLMDOMAIN: ``` 如果屬性為 null，則會使用 NTLM 驗證，並會使用目前使用者的 NTLM 網域。If the property is null, NTLM authentication will be used and the NTLM domain of the current user will be used. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果沒有`null`，這個屬性可以包含 NT/Windows 2000年定義域，以便取得要驗證的使用者名稱。If not `null`, this property can contain the name of the Windows NT/Windows 2000 domain in which to obtain the user to authenticate. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePrivileges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要為連接作業啟用使用者權限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

summary.span: 在執行的作業需要啟用某些使用者權限時 (例如，電腦重新開機) 才應該使用這個屬性。

span.span: This property should only be used when the operation performed requires a certain user privilege to be enabled (for example, a machine restart).

value.span: 傳回 值，指出是否需要為連接作業啟用使用者權限。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果使用者權限需要啟用連接作業。否則， `false`。`true` if user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::ImpersonationLevel Impersonation { System::Management::ImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::ImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 COM 模擬等級，以使用於這個連接中的作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 傳回 列舉值，表示用於連接 WMI 的模擬等級。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the impersonation level used to connect to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定的好處是，當您信任的應用程式或服務提供者。The setting is advantageous when the provider is a trusted application or service. 不需要執行用戶端身分識別提供者，並存取檢查要求的作業。It eliminates the need for the provider to perform client identity and access checks for the requested operations. 不過，如果基於某些原因無法信任提供者，讓它可以模擬用戶端可能會造成安全性威脅。However, if for some reason the provider cannot be trusted, allowing it to impersonate the client may constitute a security threat. 在這種情況下，我們建議，此屬性設定用戶端會對較低的值，例如。In such cases, we recommend that this property be set by the client to a lower value, such as . 請注意，這可能會造成失敗的提供者來執行要求的作業缺乏足夠的權限或無法執行存取檢查。Note that this may cause failure of the provider to perform the requested operations, for lack of sufficient permissions or inability to perform access checks. ## 屬性值Property Value 要用於此連線中作業的 COM 模擬等級。The COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection. 預設值是，表示此連接在執行要求的作業時的 WMI 提供者可以模擬用戶端。The default value is , which indicates that the WMI provider can impersonate the client when performing the requested operations in this connection. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/cs/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/vb/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Locale { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於連接作業的地區設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的地區設定。

span.span: Returns a value used for the locale in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft 的地區設定識別項，字串的格式是 「 MS_*xxx*"，其中*xxx*以十六進位格式表示的地區設定識別碼 (LCID); 例如，美式英文會是一個字串會顯示為 「 MS_409"。For Microsoft locale identifiers, the format of the string is "MS_*xxx*", where *xxx* is a string in hexadecimal form that indicates the Locale Identification (LCID); for example, American English would appear as "MS_409". ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值是 DEFAULTLOCALE。The default value is DEFAULTLOCALE. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/cs/ConnectionOptions_Locale.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/vb/ConnectionOptions_Locale.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定指定使用者的密碼。

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的密碼。

span.span: Returns a value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白的字串 ("") 指定的有效長度為零的密碼。A blank string ("") specifies a valid zero-length password. 硬式編碼的密碼是一項安全性威脅。Hard-coding a password is a security threat. 使用的安全預防措施，例如加密密碼，或提示使用者輸入密碼，當您設定屬性。Use security precautions such as encrypting a password, or prompting the user for a password when you set the property. ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果使用者名稱也是`null`，所使用的認證將是目前登入的使用者。If the user name is also `null`, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::SecureString ^ SecurePassword { void set(System::Security::SecureString ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定指定使用者的密碼。

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 SecureString 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的密碼。

span.span: Returns a SecureString value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於連接作業的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the user name to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的使用者名稱。

span.span: Returns a value used as the user name in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者名稱是來自目前網域的網域，此字串可能包含網域名稱和使用者名稱，以反斜線分隔： 字串 'username' ="EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere"。If the user name is from a domain other than the current domain, the string may contain the domain name and user name, separated by a backslash: string 'username' = "EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere". `strUser`參數不可為空字串。The `strUser` parameter cannot be an empty string. ## 屬性值Property Value `null` 如果連接將使用目前登入的使用者;否則，表示使用者名稱的字串。`null` if the connection will use the currently logged-on user; otherwise, a string representing the user name. 預設值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連接到遠端電腦和遠端電腦上顯示作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A是用來連接到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/cs/ConnectionOptions_Username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/vb/ConnectionOptions_Username.vb#1)]
